title: [Blighted Forest, Treetop]
description: The generous girth of the limbs providing a framework for passageways high above the forest floor offers a safe promenade from tree to tree.  Birds sing among the black leaves robing the smaller branches, creating splashes of color against the dark foliage.  A break in the canopy offers a view of a rock-bordered stream crossing the forest floor below.

The generous girth of the limbs providing a framework for passageways high above the forest floor offers a safe promenade from tree to tree.  Night birds serenade the darkness from the surrounding shadowy foliage.  A break in the canopy offers a view of a rock-bordered stream crossing the forest floor below.
